summary: A mysterious circus comes to a western town bearing wonders and characters that entertain the inhabitants and teach valuable lessons.
cast: Tony Randall|Barbara Eden|Arthur O'Connell|John Ericson|Noah Beery Jr.|Lee Patrick|Minerva Urecal|John Qualen|Frank Kreig|Peggy Rea|Eddie Little Sky|Royal Dano|Argentina Brunetti|John Doucette|Dal McKennon|Frank Cady|Chubby Johnson|Douglas Fowley|Kevin Tate|Mary Benoit|John Breen|George Cisar|Stewart East|Herman Hack|Betsy Hale|George J. Lewis|Joe Ploski|Péter Pál|Mitchell Rhein|Arnold Roberts|Fred Scheiwiller
title: Las siete caras del Dr. Lao
